group_1.narration: Tsubaki and Matsuri accepted Aimi's invitation@to go to the shopping mall.
When they came back,@I could tell right away that something was wrong@from their expressions.
They called me and Suzune,@as well as Kokoro and Masara,@and told us about...
A suspicious flower that resembled the May bells@we saw at the gates of Chuo Academy.

group_1.textLeft: In other words... When you followed the@scent of flowers...
...you encountered a Witch's Labyrinth,@and after defeating it...
...there was a flower resembling May bells...

group_1.textRight: When you touched it, it withered...
And you heard a voice...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes.

group_1.textRight: ...But, until I touched the flower...
I couldn't tell who was calling me...

group_1.textLeft: Something's definitely wrong, right?
Who was the person calling to you?

group_1.textRight: H-huh? Suzune?
What? Hey, are you okay?@Can you hear me? Hey!

group_1.textLeft: ...Uh, yeah, we were talking about something@being definitely wrong.

group_1.textRight: ...Huh? Are you really okay?
Weren't we talking about who called out to@Aimi...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, sorry about that. [chara:403101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:403101:cheek_0][chara:403101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:403101:lipSynch_1]Weird, I even asked you@that myself...
(Is there...something amiss...?)

group_1.textCenter: Kokoro, Masara, you guys know, right?

group_1.textLeft: Wha...?! Hold on, NEITHER of you know?!

group_1.textRight: Huh?
About what...?

group_1.textLeft: What...? Geeze, pull yourselves together!

group_1.textCenter: (Is this...some kind of magic at work...?)

group_1.textLeft: Something strange is going on here.

group_1.textRight: ...Hmm?

group_1.textLeft: When Aimi tried to tell them the name of@her friend...
It appears that their thoughts stagnated...

group_1.textRight: Now that you mention it... I think you're right.

group_1.textLeft: This is just a guess, but...
Perhaps for those who haven't been exposed@to the flower...
Some sort of magic comes into effect.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: ...To put it simply, there's a force that blocks their "perception"...
When we discuss a particular topic, their thoughts@are forcibly interrupted and they become dazed.
They may be under some kind of spell...

group_1.textRight: Blocks our "perception"...
...Is that also why you can't smell the flower...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's possible the same force is preventing@me from perceiving it.

group_1.textRight: If it's messing with our perception, does that@mean there's something it wants to hide...?
Huh? But why would it hide Natsuki?
Who could do something like this in the first@place...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know.
But... When we made contact with that@flower...
I'm certain that broke the spell on us.
Therefore...
I intend to investigate that suspicious flower.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, there's something really strange about@that flower.
I agree! If there's a Witch involved, we could be@in big trouble!

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case, you can count me in too.

group_1.textRight: Same here! I'll help too.
.........[wait:1][chara:302901:lipSynch_1]Well...
I also want to understand what's happening.

group_1.textLeft: How about you, Kagari?

group_1.narration: For some reason... I have a bad feeling@about this...
Like we shouldn't be exposed to it... And that@there'll be no going back once we're aware of it...

group_1.textLeft: Kagari doesn't seem very keen on the idea.
But, in order to protect our peaceful and@happy days...
I think we need to investigate.

group_1.textRight: I donâ€™t want to leave it unchecked...
And have our precious life fall apart@before we know it...
A Witch got in your way at the mall, too.
Let's be careful, alright?

group_1.textLeft: Kagari...
You're right. Let's remain vigilant.

group_1.textRight: To start with, why don't we let everyone look at@the flower in the mall?
Yeah, it would be easier to understand if@everyone touched it.
